name: Escort
description:
We've lost control of a cargo ship carrying a terratonne of explosives! It's on full throttle, and we have no way of steering! Use the Skipper to help us direct it until it runs out of fuel.

Redicrect the cargo ship by shooting it or bumping into it. Hitting it at its ends will make it turn more.

Controls:

Wasd/Arrow Keys/numpad/control stick - Directions

Mouse 1/Space/Right Ctrl/Numpad Enter/Gamepad A - Shoot

Mouse 2/Left Shift/Numpad 0//Gamepad X or A - Speed up the Cargo Ship

M - Flip y axis (some controllers apparently need this.)

P - ???

Full screen is recommended (unless it makes it laggy.)

Use a gampad if you can (directional keys are not easy to use.)

Everything was made by me.

Programs used:
Unity
SFXR
Audacity
Paint.Net
